author: Michael C. Bender
title: Trump Sees Role for Mental Institutions in Stopping Mass Shootings
text:
WASHINGTON—President Donald Trump said he supported giving law-enforcement officials “immediate access” to take weapons from the mentally ill and called for a national conversation on mental institutions.
Two weeks after 17 people were shot dead at Marjory Stoneman Douglas High School in Parkland, Fla., Mr. Trump suggested that the alleged shooter, Nikolas Cruz, should have been institutionalized before he was able to harm others.
